citation.article-title: Pseudoruegeria lutimaris sp. nov., isolated from a tidal flat sediment, and emended description of the genus Pseudoruegeria
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Pseudoruegeria Yoon et al. 2007
The description of the genus Pseudoruegeria is as given by Yoon et al. (2007) with the following amendments.
Common major polar lipids are phosphatidylglycerol, an unidentified aminolipid and an unidentified lipid.
The DNA G+C content is 67.0–73.5 mol%.
